Lyric:
[00:07.960]Even when the thunder and storm begins 
[00:11.520]I'll be standing stong like a tree in the wind 
[00:15.150]Nothing is gonna move this mountain or change my direction 
[00:22.180]I'm falling off the sky and I'm all alone 
[00:25.600]The courage that's inside is gonna break my fall 
[00:29.100]Nothing is gonna dim my light within 
[00:35.400]But if I keep going on it will never be impossible 
[00:43.818]Not today. 
[00:45.739]
[00:48.160]Cause I got something to believe in 
[00:52.148]As long as I'm breathing 
[00:55.468]There is not a limit to what I can dream 
[01:02.428]Cause I got something to believe in 
[01:06.800]Mission to keep climbing 
[01:09.960]Nothing else can stop me if I just believe 
[01:16.869]And I believe in me. 
[01:18.100]
[01:20.399]Even when the world tries to pull me down 
[01:23.229]Tell me that I can't... try to turn me around 
[01:27.160]I wont let them put my fire out 
[01:32.789]But if I keep going on it will never be impossible 
[01:42.199]Not today 
[01:43.130]
[01:45.449]Cause I got something to believe in 
[01:49.529]As long as I'm breathing 
[01:52.990]There is not a limit to what I can dream 
[01:59.829]Cause I got something to believe in 
[02:03.780]Mission to keep climbing 
[02:08.259]Nothing else can stop me if I just believe
[02:14.900]And I believe 
[02:15.500]
[02:16.280]I can do it all, open every door 
[02:30.730]Turn unthinkable to reality 
[02:37.600]You see I can do it all and more 
[02:43.579]
[02:44.770]Believing as long as I'm breathing 
[02:50.500]There is no limit to what I can dream 
[02:59.210]Believing mission to keep climbing 
[03:04.920]Nothing else can stop me if I just believe 
[03:12.000]And I believe in me.
